pkgmetadata.longdescription: Doubly Truncated Data Analysis, Cumulative Incidence Functions // Nonparametric estimator of the cumulative incidences of competing risks under double truncation. The estimator generalizes the Efron-Petrosian NPMLE (Non-Parametric Maximun Likelihood Estimator) to the competing risks setting. Efron, B. and Petrosian, V. (1999) doi:10.2307/2669997.
